Ralph Extension Tests
====================

✓ Agent review test helpers available

  2. Follow test/AGENT_REVIEW_TESTING_GUIDE.md for manual testing
  3. Run automated tests with: pnpm test

Test helpers exported:

  - AgentReviewWorkflowTests.validateReportStructure()

  - AgentReviewWorkflowTests.validateErrorReport()
